main.name: Jiayi Li

resume.skillmessage: Experienced in Software & Web Development, familiar with frameworks like Spring, Core Java, Google Guice, React and so on

education.school: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
education.degree: B.S. in Electronic and Information Engineering

description.stacks: React, Redux-Saga, RESTful API, Mapbox GL, AWS components(Lambda, DynamoDB, Redshift)
points: Added new feature to internal tool, which visualizes internal data on the map.
Created UI Component using react-redux (for state control) and redux-saga (for async actions).
Designed unified query API for multiple-endpoints(SQL and No-SQL) with GraphQL.
Implemented AWS Lambda to fetch and transform backend data.
Enabled AWS resource cross-region access and permission control by configuring Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) and Identity and Access Management (IAM).
Used Agile and Scrum framework. Involved in Sprint Planning, Stand-up, and Retro meetings.

description.stacks: Apache Commons Net, Android SDK (API level 24)
points: Developed an Android bug report App to capture, compress and upload logs to server.
Implemented FTP file upload feature with Apache Commons Net.
Implemented FTP file upload feature with Apache Commons Net.
Customized a State Progress Bar and a Circular Progress Bar to promote UI consistency.
Created an automation shell script for Android development (getting the signature and installing App).
